data.description:
Get in flow, unlock new creatures, and dive into the world of Skybinder.

Skybinder is a minimalist VR puzzle game. 

* Connect dots to solve increasingly detailed 3D puzzles
* Create an enormous whale and a cheeky chicken, triangle by triangle
* Discover which dots among dozens connect to reveal a king cobra

Activate your mind in this meditative game that soothes and stimulates. Skybinder is a puzzle anyone can play, but few can master. Can you become the Skybinder?

changelog.change_log:
- Hint mini object now has the color of the mesh when it is completed
- Music now updates according to an exponential curve rather than linearly

- Added in-game music
- Added "mute" button to hand menus

Skybinder 1.2.1 Update addresses a variety of quality of life improvements for new users and advanced users as well as a variety of bug fixes:
- The objects in the main menu are now sequential
- Fixed bug that caused the system re-centering feature to not work
- Removed in-app re-centering and replaced it with the system re-centering feature
- Fixed bug that made it so users were unable to delete lines
- Improved visibility of the UI interaction ray
- Improved the text on the tutorial
- Users can now delete lines using the trigger button
- Improved the multi-vertex drag feature
- Removed the ground grid
- Lowered the price to $9.99 USD
- The controller model now shrinks when grabbing the world
- Improved the order of the animals on the main scene

- Improved credits scene
- Minor visual improvements

- Main title fixes
- Improved loading time
- Prepared localization for build
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved navigation arrows
- Minor bug fixes

- New Loading Scene
- Implemented Oculus Custom Splash Screen
- Implemented Entitlement Check
- Implemented IAP system

* Security Improvements
* Implemented IAP menu button

App Version: 0.12.2 
* Improved security features
* Back End Improvements
* Portal sequence now has music
* Updated all game fonts
* Tutorial now alows user to collide with vertices using the entire controller
